mainHero.title: Are you a student athlete or a mindful coach?
mainHero.description: MindfulPerformance accurately matches student-athletes with certified mindfulness coaches.

primaryAction.text: Sign me up for the waitlist

product.title: Mindful Performance
product.subtitle: Bridging the gap to peak performance

items.title: Student Athletes:
items.description: Ready to master your mindset, overcome performance anxiety, and perform at your best in any situation, every time?
items.signup: Click the button below to sign up for our waitlist to unlock your full potential and get matched with your perfect mindfulness coach for personalized, on-demand mindfulness coaching.

items.title: Mindfulness Coaches:
items.description: Expand your coaching impact while working less.
items.signup: Click the button below to sign up for our waitlist to connect with student athletes who need your expertise, and focus on what you do best - transforming lives through mindfulness coaching.

reviews.title: Don't just take our word for it! See what student-athletes and mindfulness coaches are saying about Mindful Performance.
reviews.subtitle: We conducted extensive research and talked to numerous college athletes and mindfulness coaches to understand their needs and preferences. Here's what we discovered:

items.title: Student-Athletes
items.description: 8/10 of student-athletes expressed a strong need for access to flexible and convenient mindfulness coaching sessions

items.title: Mindfulness Coaches
items.description: 9/10 mindfulness coaches surveyed expressed a keen interest in joining Mindful Performance.

atheletefeatures.subtitle: Student-Athletes: Unlock Your Peak Performance
atheletefeatures.description: Mindful Performance connects you with expert mindfulness coaches for personalized, on-demand guidance to:
atheletefeatures.desc2: Achieve excellence in all aspects of your life with Mindful Performance.

items.name: Manage Stress
items.description: Manage stress and anxiety, performing at your best when it counts the most.

items.name: Build Resilience
items.description: Develop resilience, bounce back stronger, and experience more joy.

items.name: Focus
items.description: Master your mindset, live with a champion's mentality, and embrace challenges.

items.name: Achieve Greatness
items.description: Excel in any situation, every time, both on and off the field.

coachfeatures.subtitle: Mindfulness Coaches: Streamline, Scale, and Transform Lives
coachfeatures.description: Mindful Performance is the only all-in-one, AI-powered platform designed to help you scale your business and spend more time transforming lives, not on administrative tasks. We provide everything you need to:
coachfeatures.desc2: Focus on what you do best - Coaching - and let Mindful Performance handle the rest.

items.name: Expand Reach
items.description: Expand your reach and effortlessly connect with clients through our one-stop client hub.

items.name: Grow Business
items.description: Strategically grow your business using powerful analytics to assess session impacts.

items.name: CRM Tools
items.description: Streamline client management with our specialized, built-in CRM tools.

items.name: Enhance Sessions
items.description: Enhance your sessions with our private and secure client journaling feature.
